Basic Conversation: you're welcome [response to thank you / thanks]

Conversa bàsica: Em dic ... - El meu nom és...
La meva dona - la meva muller
(El meu fill) té gana - (el meu fill) té fam

Basic Conversation: Where is the toilet? / Where is the bathroom?
I need to take a shower
Where can I take a shower?
I need to make a phone call
Can you write that down for me?

Conversa bàsica: On és el centre de registre?

Basic Conversation: How long do we have to wait here?
Conversa bàsica: Quanta estona tenim que esperar aquí?
Torno en un moment - Tornaré aviat

Basic Conversation: I feel sick/ I don't feel well
I am having an allergic reaction
I have a fever / a temperature
My child has a sore throat/ cough
Conversa bàsica: El meu fill (la meva filla) té mal de coll - El meu fill (la meva filla) té tos

Basic Conversation: I am a vegetarian.I don’t eat meat and fish.
Conversa bàsica: Sóc vegetarià (vegetariana). No menjo carn ni peix.
